description:
About the Role
We are seeking a Financial Analyst who combines financial modeling capability with hands-on experience in the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js) and TypeScript.
This role focuses on translating financial logic and statistical reasoning into scalable web-based simulation systems and decision-support tools.
Candidates with 2–3 years of relevant experience are preferred. Strong fresh graduates with solid technical foundations are also welcome to apply.
Key Responsibilities
Build and structure financial models (forecasting, cash flow, scenario analysis).
Implement financial logic in MERN + TypeScript applications.
Develop and enhance React-based dashboards and simulation interfaces.
Build backend services using Node.js and Express.
Manage financial data using MongoDB.
Integrate APIs and handle structured data flows (REST, JSON).
Test and validate model accuracy within web systems.
Collaborate with consultants and product teams on system improvements.

Requirements
Degree in IT / Computer Science, Finance, Business, or a related field.
2–3 years of relevant experience in financial analysis, modeling, or related roles (fresh graduates with strong technical skills may also apply).
Demonstrated experience building financial models (academic, internship, or professional).
Proficiency in TypeScript.
Practical understanding of the MERN stack
Understanding of frontend–backend data flow.
Familiarity with REST APIs and JSON.
Experience with Git.
Strong analytical reasoning and structured problem-solving skills.

What You’ll Gain
Exposure to real-world simulation systems used in corporate decision-making.
Hands-on experience building scalable financial engines in a modern web stack.
Cross-functional collaboration across finance, product, and engineering.
Growth toward Simulation Developer, Financial Systems Engineer, or Product Modeling roles.
About Int Labs
Int Labs is an innovative training and consultancy company built by practitioners, entrepreneurs, and founders. Originating in Singapore, we specialize in providing experiential, simulation-based training solutions, focusing on leadership development, innovation capabilities, and strategic planning for ambitious corporations in Indonesia and across the region.

Kesempatan
PT Pristine Prima Lestari, perusahaan yang bergerak di bidang produksi Bumbu (Seasoning), mencari Sales Data Analyst yang berpengalaman untuk bergabung dengan tim kami di Cengkareng, Jakarta Raya. Sebagai Sales Data Analyst, Anda akan memainkan peran penting dalam menganalisis dan melaporkan data penjualan untuk mendukung strategi penjualan dan pengambilan keputusan bisnis. Kandidat yang ideal memiliki kemampuan analitis yang kuat, pemahaman yang mendalam tentang tren pasar, dan kemampuan untuk menerjemahkan wawasan data menjadi tindakan yang dapat dieksekusi.
Tanggung Jawab
Mengumpulkan, menganalisis, dan menafsirkan data penjualan untuk mengidentifikasi peluang peningkatan kinerja penjualan.
Membuat laporan dan dashboard penjualan yang informatif untuk mengomunikasikan wawasan dan tren kepada tim manajemen.
Berkolaborasi dengan tim penjualan dan pemasaran untuk memberikan rekomendasi strategis berdasarkan analisis data.
Memantau dan menganalisis kinerja produk, pelanggan, dan saluran distribusi untuk mengidentifikasi area peningkata.
Menyiapkan laporan performa penjualan secara berkala.
Melakukan forecasting penjualan dan analisis kinerja.
Mengevaluasi efektivitas promosi, harga, dan campaign penjualan.
Memastikan akurasi dan konsistensi data pada seluruh sistem pelaporan.
Memahami konfigurasi CRM serta mendukung proses implementasi dan penggunaannya.
Berpartisipasi dalam proyek-proyek strategis di fungsi Sales & Marketing.

Kualifikasi
Pendidikan minimal S1 di bidang Statistik, Matematika, Data Science, Bisnis, Sistem Informasi, atau bidang terkait.
Minimal 2 tahun pengalaman sebagai Data Analyst, Business Analyst atau posisi serupa (pengalaman di industri manufaktur menjadi nilai tambah).
Mahir menggunakan Microsoft Excel (pivot table, rumus tingkat lanjut, data analysis tools, dan pembuatan dashboard).
Memahami metrik penjualan (revenue/pendapatan, growth rate/tingkat pertumbuhan, conversion rate/tingkat konversi, dan lain-lain).
Memiliki kemampuan analitis yang kuat, teliti terhadap detail, serta memiliki kemampuan problem solving yang baik.
Memiliki kemampuan komunikasi yang baik dan mampu menyampaikan insight/data secara jelas kepada stakeholder.

Tugas & Tanggung Jawab (Job Desk):
Analisis Performa Penjualan: Mengevaluasi pencapaian target penjualan mingguan dan bulanan, serta mengidentifikasi faktor pendorong (driver) atau penghambat penjualan.
Optimasi Inventory: Menganalisis siklus hidup produk (product lifecycle) dan memberikan rekomendasi strategi markdown (diskon) atau restock untuk menjaga kesehatan stok di gudang dan toko.
Riset Pasar & Tren: Melakukan analisis kompetitor dan tren fashion untuk membantu tim Merchandising menentukan arah koleksi berikutnya.
Evaluasi Promosi: Menghitung ROI (Return on Investment) dari setiap kampanye marketing dan promosi toko guna memastikan efektivitas anggaran.
Peningkatan Proses Bisnis: Mengidentifikasi inefisiensi dalam operasional retail (seperti alur distribusi atau sistem kasir) dan mengusulkan solusi perbaikan.
Pelaporan Strategis: Menyusun presentasi laporan yang mendalam namun mudah dipahami oleh jajaran manajemen sebagai landasan pengambilan keputusan.
Kualifikasi & Persyaratan:
Pendidikan: Minimal S1 di bidang Bisnis, Manajemen, Ekonomi, Statistika, atau Teknik Industri.
Pengalaman: Minimal 2-3 tahun pengalaman sebagai Business Analyst atau posisi serupa (diutamakan dari industri Retail atau E-commerce).
Kemampuan Analitis: Memiliki kemampuan berpikir kritis yang kuat, mampu menghubungkan titik-titik data yang berbeda menjadi satu kesimpulan logis.
Kemampuan Teknis:
Mahir dalam menggunakan Microsoft Excel (Advanced: Pivot Table, VLOOKUP/XLOOKUP, Macro/VBA).
Familiar dengan alat visualisasi data seperti Tableau, Power BI, atau BI BES.
Memahami dasar-dasar SQL untuk penarikan data merupakan nilai tambah.
Keahlian Bisnis: Memahami konsep KPI retail seperti Same-Store Sales Growth (SSSG), Sell-through Rate, dan Gross Margin Return on Investment (GMROI).
Komunikasi: Mampu berkomunikasi dengan baik dan mempresentasikan ide secara persuasif kepada berbagai tingkat pemangku kepentingan.
Karakter: Jujur, teliti, proaktif, dan mampu bekerja di bawah tekanan dalam lingkungan retail yang dinamis.

The Digitalization Officer is responsible for driving data collection, analysis, and visualization initiatives to support operational efficiency and client transparency. The role focuses on gathering project-related data, developing and maintaining dashboards (particularly using Power BI), and providing meaningful insights to management and clients to showcase operational performance and continuous improvement.
Key Responsibilities:
1. Data Management and Collection
Coordinate with project teams to collect, validate, and consolidate operational and performance data from various sources.
Ensure data accuracy, completeness, and consistency across all reporting platforms.
Develop standardized templates and tools for project data submission and tracking.
2. Data Visualization and Reporting
Design, build, and maintain Power BI dashboards to visualize project and operational performance.
Present data insights and performance indicators to internal stakeholders and clients in a clear and professional manner.
Automate recurring reports and develop interactive visual tools to support decision-making.
3. Digitalization Initiatives
Support the implementation of digital tools and platforms to enhance operational efficiency and data-driven management.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify digital solutions for process optimization and reporting improvements.
Participate in digital transformation projects, including workflow automation and data integration initiatives.
4. Performance Monitoring and Analysis
Track and analyze key performance indicators (KPIs) for ongoing projects.
Provide data-driven recommendations to improve operational effectiveness and client satisfaction.
Support management reviews and client presentations with up-to-date performance data.
5. Compliance and Documentation
Maintain proper documentation of data sources, methodologies, and dashboards.
Ensure compliance with company data governance, confidentiality, and security policies.
Qualifications and Experience:
Bachelor’s degree in Information Technology, Data Analytics, Business Administration, or related field.
Proven experience (2–4 years) in data management, business intelligence, or digital transformation roles.
Proficiency in Microsoft Power BI, Excel (advanced), and data visualization tools.
Familiarity with databases, data cleaning, and integration tools (e.g., SQL, SharePoint, Power Automate) is an advantage.
Strong analytical thinking, attention to detail, and problem-solving skills.
Excellent communication and presentation abilities for both internal and client-facing reporting.
Core Competencies:
Data-driven mindset and analytical approach.
Strong digital literacy and interest in emerging technologies.
Collaboration and teamwork across departments.
Proactive attitude and ability to manage multiple priorities.
Commitment to accuracy, quality, and continuous improvement.

Collect, analyze, and share data from multiple sources to help teams drive improvement in key business metrics, and business results.
Identify the required data and generate hypotheses based on targets and goals.
Create periodic reports and dashboards to monitor metrics and measure business performance.
Work closely with the performance marketing team and other stakeholders to define metrics for measuring campaign success and achieving goals.
Provide data-driven recommendations to improve channel and campaign performance.
Conduct predictive analysis and forecasting on a regular basis to help the team achieve targets.
Requirement:
3+ years of experience as a Marketing Analyst, Data Analyst, or BusinessIntelligence Analyst.
Experience using marketing analytics tools such as Google Analytics (GA4),Firebase, AppsFlyer, and Google Tag Manager (GTM).
Experience with reporting and data visualization tools such as Looker, Tableau,and Power BI.
Understanding of funnel analysis and the ability to analyze campaignperformance using ROI and ROAS.
Knowledge and understanding of performance marketing strategies, tactics,and tools, including but not limited to Google Ads, Meta Ads, and TikTok Ads.
Experience with query tools such as MySQL and Google BigQuery.
Tools skills needed:
Analytics tools: Google Analytics (GA4), Excel/Spreadsheet.
Ads Dashboard (from the platform used, such as Meta Ads dashboard, GoogleAds dashboard, TikTok Ads dashboard, etc).
Visualization Data: Looker, Tableau, PowerBI.
Query Tools: Google BigQuery, MySQL, PostgreSQL or Query UI like Supermetrics.
Organic & CRM Tools such as SEMRush & MoEngage is a plus point

We seek to employ the brightest and most forward-thinking talent on the planet.
We always welcome candidates with excellent technical skills in databases such as Oracle, MySQL and  PostgreSQL or Enterprise Application such as Tableau (data visualization) or PAM.
We want to hire people who have their best work ahead of them, not behind them.  Accelerate your career and succeed in an environment where you can make an impact daily. 
We invite you to join us to stand out.
 ·       Responsibilities
Presales
-          Demonstrated ability to troubleshoot challenging technical issues 
-          Excellent client/ customer management skills in term of presales engagement
-          Support TOR include creating and changing together with partners
-          Good technical presentation skills.
Support
-          To manage and resolve Service Requests logged by customers (internal and external) on database and CDC / Enterprise Software (data visualization)  and contribute to proactive support activities according to product support strategy and model
-          Owning and resolving problems and managing customer expectations throughout the Service Request lifecycle in accordance with global standards
-          Working towards, adopting and contributing to new processes and tools (diagnostic methodology, health checks, scripting tools, etc.)
-          Contributing to Knowledge Management content creation and maintenance
-          Working with development on product improvement programs
·       Desired Skills and Requirement
-          Experience troubleshooting and optimizing database performance
-          Strong experience with relational databases such as Oracle (or other DB) is required.
-          Good to have experience on Tableau, Qlik or PowerBI.
-          A fundamental understanding of IT service management and the ITIL business process
-          Bachelor or higher in Computer Information Systems or equivalent experience in a related field
-          Familiarity with Linux or other OS
-          Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English - with the ability to clearly articulate solutions to complex technical problems
-          Ability to work with high-value customer administrators and developers
-          Excellent time management skills
·       Work Environment
We are a dynamic and rapidly growing software company with a strong sense of dedication to our customers. We provide competitive compensation, generous benefits, and a professional, yet relaxed atmosphere.
·       Salary
Negotiable

Key Responsibilities :
Cross-Division Collaboration & Stakeholder Engagement
Communicate clearly and humbly to understand real pain points on the ground.
Conduct interviews, shadow workflows, and gather structured input.
Process Discovery & AI-Assisted Documentation
Break down existing workflows step-by-step (current state).
Standardize documentation across divisions.
Process Redesign (Future State)
Redesign workflows for clarity, traceability, accountability, and measurable performance.
Validate redesigned processes with relevant divisions before rollout.
Automation Implementation
Develop or deploy automation solutions (scripts, integrations, internal tools).
Integrate AI into workflows for data extraction, validation, document processing, and decision support.
Continuous AI Exploration & Optimization
Stay updated with emerging AI and automation tools.
Proactively identify new use cases to improve efficiency.

Requirements
1.5–3 years experience in software engineering, automation, AI implementation, or process improvement.
Strong structured thinking and analytical ability.
Hands-on programming ability (Python preferred) & experience 1.5 years.
Strong familiarity with AI tools (ChatGPT, Gemini, Claude, etc.).
Ability to communicate clearly and work humbly with diverse teams.
Comfortable operating with ambiguity and minimal instruction.
High ownership mindset and self-driven learner.
Proficient English written and verbal a MUST

What you will do

1. Credit Scoring &Modeling
Support HQ indevelopingandmaintainingcreditscoringmodelsusingSQL,Python,and machine learning techniques. Contribute to credit policy refinement through data-driven insights and model performance analysis.

2. Portfolio Monitoring & Reporting
Monitor portfolio performance, delinquency, and loss trends to identify early risk signals.
Deliver monthly portfolio reports and analytical insights for management and related business units.

3. Exploration of New Data Sources & Tools
Evaluate and test alternate local data sources or tools to enhance underwriting precision.
Lead proof-of-concept (POC) initiatives and assess their business and risk impact.

4. Regulatory & Partner Engagement
Represent the Credit Risk team in OJK audits and bank partner engagements.
Prepare reports and defend the company’s portfolio quality and underwriting standards to regulators and partners.

What you will need to have
1. Bachelor's or Master's in Finance, Statistics, Mathematics, Data Science, or related field.
2. 4-6 years experience in data science, credit scoring model development, portfolio analytics, or credit management. Ideally in fintech or retail banking. Exposure to OJK/regulatory audits is preferred.
3. Strong in SQL & Python skills, statistical modelling and ML knowledge.
4. Experience with portfolio reporting and impact analysis. Familiarity with OJK credit risk requirements.
5. Possess analytical and detail oriented. Strong communicator, able to present insights clearly.
6. Collaborative, and able to manage multiple priorities.

Deskripsi Pekerjaan:
Mengolah data dan menyajikan laporan untuk management & user
Menganalisis dan menafsirkan kumpulan data yang berkaitan dengan bisnis perusahaan
Menganalisa data untuk pendukung pengambilan keputusan
Berkoordinasi dengan divisi lain untuk menghasilkan laporan yang dibutuhkan
Membantu menerjemahkan data ke dalam visualisasi, metrik, dan tujuan

Kualifikasi:
Pendidikan minimal S1 Jurusan Statistik/ Matematika (IPK minimal 3.00)
Berpengalaman bekerja minimal 5 tahun sebagai Data Analis di industri FMCG
Mahir Mengoperasikan Microsoft Excel
Kemampuan riset dan analisa yang tajam
Teliti, cekatan, jujur, dan pekerja keras
Berpikir kritis saat memecahkan berbagai solusi dari permasalahan yang ada
Berpikir logis dengan memanfaatkan berbagai metode

Job Description
Develop and implement machine learning models and algorithms to solve business problems, leveraging both structured and unstructured data.
Design and build scalable and efficient data pipelines for data ingestion, preprocessing, and feature engineering.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand business requirements and translate them into technical specifications.
Conduct exploratory data analysis (EDA) to gain insights and identify patterns or trends.
Evaluate and select appropriate machine learning techniques, models, and algorithms based on project requirements.
Train, optimize, and fine-tune machine learning models using large-scale datasets.
Validate and test models for accuracy, reliability, and robustness.
Monitor and maintain deployed models, ensuring their performance and stability.
Collaborate with Data Engineers to integrate machine learning models into production systems.
Stay up to date with advancements in machine learning and actively contribute to the team's knowledge base.
Communicate findings, results, and recommendations to both technical and non-technical stakeholders or customers.

Requirements
Minimum 1 year of experience in Machine Learning and Data Science.
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Data Science, Mathematics, Statistics, or a related field (Master’s or Ph.D. is a plus).
Proven experience as a Data Scientist, Machine Learning Engineer, or similar role, with a strong track record of deploying models in real-world applications.
Proficiency in Python, R, or Scala, and experience with popular frameworks such as TensorFlow, PyTorch, or scikit-learn.
Solid understanding of machine learning techniques (supervised/unsupervised learning, deep learning, NLP, and reinforcement learning).
Experience with data manipulation, preprocessing, and feature engineering.
Strong knowledge of statistical analysis, hypothesis testing, and experimental design.
Familiarity with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, or GCP) and distributed computing (Hadoop, Spark).
Proficiency in SQL and database management systems.
Strong problem-solving skills with the ability to navigate complex and ambiguous business challenges.
Excellent communication and teamwork skills.

Job Description:
Develop and integrate platforms that enable development teams to access infrastructure, tools, and services through self-service capabilities.
Design, build, and maintain data engineering solutions to support business and application requirements.
Develop and maintain automation scripts for infrastructure provisioning, configuration, and management.
Configure, maintain, and optimize Kubernetes clusters to ensure application availability, performance, and reliability.
Support implementation and management of Change Data Capture (CDC) and Kafka-based streaming solutions.
Monitor platform performance and troubleshoot issues to maintain system stability and security.
Support implementation and maintenance of monitoring and logging tools such as Grafana and ELK Stack.
Support CI/CD pipeline implementation and containerization processes using Docker, Kubernetes, and Helm Chart.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to support application development and system integration.
Ensure platform and data infrastructure align with business needs, particularly within banking product processes.

Minimum Bachelor’s Degree (S1) from a reputable university in:
Computer Engineering
Informatics Engineering
Information Systems
Computer Science
Information Technology
Computer Systems
Management Information Systems
Minimum 3 years of experience as a Data Engineer.
Minimum 3 years of experience in projects or system development involving:
Change Data Capture (CDC)
Apache Kafka
Experience implementing or supporting projects involving:
Grafana
ELK Stack
CI/CD pipelines
Docker / Containerization
Kubernetes
Helm Chart
Strong understanding of Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC) including Waterfall and/or Agile methodologies.
Strong analytical skills with attention to detail.
Strong problem-finding and problem-solving capabilities.
Good understanding of banking product business processes.
Strong teamwork, communication, and interpersonal skills.

Key Responsibilities :
Cross-Division Collaboration & Stakeholder Engagement
Communicate clearly and humbly to understand real pain points on the ground.
Conduct interviews, shadow workflows, and gather structured input.
Process Discovery & AI-Assisted Documentation
Break down existing workflows step-by-step (current state).
Standardize documentation across divisions.
Process Redesign (Future State)
Redesign workflows for clarity, traceability, accountability, and measurable performance.
Validate redesigned processes with relevant divisions before rollout.
Automation Implementation
Develop or deploy automation solutions (scripts, integrations, internal tools).
Integrate AI into workflows for data extraction, validation, document processing, and decision support.
Continuous AI Exploration & Optimization
Stay updated with emerging AI and automation tools.
Proactively identify new use cases to improve efficiency.

Requirements
1.5–3 years experience in software engineering, automation, AI implementation, or process improvement.
Strong structured thinking and analytical ability.
Hands-on programming ability (Python preferred) & experience 1.5 years.
Strong familiarity with AI tools (ChatGPT, Gemini, Claude, etc.).
Ability to communicate clearly and work humbly with diverse teams.
Comfortable operating with ambiguity and minimal instruction.
High ownership mindset and self-driven learner.
Proficient English written and verbal a MUST

An Insurance BPO company with global operations is looking for a passionate, detail-oriented individual with English skills and abilities to work as Data Entry Specialist performing tasks such as inputting data into system, insurance operational work & communicating with stakeholders (in English).
Qualifications:
Having good attention to details is mandatory
Excellent verbal and written English skills – please attach copy of your TOEFL/IELTS score, if any
Must have a minimum high school diploma or equivalent (preferably math/engineering/science/accounting/philosophy major)
Must have a minimum 1 year experience as a Full Time Employee (not freelance/internship/part time)
Fast-learner, self-starter and highly motivated
Proficient computer skills
Able to work under tight deadlines in a fast-paced working environment, independently and together as a team
Comfortable in doing meticulous and data-driven tasks
Eager to grow and learn something new
Having good knowledge or experience in data processing of insurance industry is a plus
Willingness to work in night-shift is preferable (allowance is provided)
Interested candidates may send their motivation letter and updated CV (everything must be in English).

Role and Responsibilities:
Tackle real industry challenges by applying analytics, machine learning, and optimization solutions to copper mining operations.
Use research and analytical expertise to test ideas, validate hypotheses, and uncover insights that drive resource-efficient mining.
Build and scale solutions in cloud environment to deliver clear, actionable insights for leadership and operations teams.
Design, implement, and maintain data-driven tools that solve complex business problems with advanced statistical and analytical methods.
Requirements:
Willingness to travel if required (up to 30%, primarily to mining site)
Strong proficiency in English, both written and verbal.
Minimum Bachelor’s degree in Statistics, Mathematics, Engineering, Physics, or a related field (more advanced degree is a plus).
More than 3 years' experience working as a Data Scientist is mandatory.
Hands-on expertise in predictive modeling (e.g., Regression, Random Forest, Gradient Boosting), time series analysis, NLP, anomaly detection, or survival analysis.
Proficiency in Python and its data science stack for data analysis, visualization, and modeling.
Solid knowledge of SQL and experience with big-data platforms (Snowflake experience is a plus).
Experience with cloud-based ML tools (Azure a big plus).
Proven ability to mentor, collaborate, and grow a high-performing data science team.
Strategic thinker with a proven track record of transforming data into actionable insights that drive decision-making.
Why join Us?
We offer very attractive salary and outstanding benefits.
Most of our clients are multinational company which you will be exposed to a large IT environment and valuable experience in international scale projects.
You will always learn new things as our projects always adopt latest technology and best practice available in the market.
Last but not least, we offer a supportive and encouraging environment that puts the emphasis on teamwork. Here, your soft skill (professional relationships, character, attitude) will grow as fast as your technical skill

Job Descriptions:
Perform data exploration, data cleaning, data imputation, and feature engineering on unstructured and structured data.
Design, Develop and maintain report used for daily operation, management and analytics
Build the infrastructure for optimal extraction, transformation, and loading (ETL) of data from a wide variety of data sources.
Develop and maintain all data flows and prepare all ETL processes according to business requirements and incorporate all business requirements into all design specifications
Identifying, designing and implementing internal process improvements including re-designing infrastructure for greater scalability, optimizing data delivery, and automating manual processes 
Build analytics tools that utilize the data pipeline to provide actionable insights
Explore ways to enhance data quality and reliability Explore ways to enhance data quality and reliability
Document all test procedures for systems and processes              
 Job Requirements:
Bachelor's degree from computer science or related fields, or equivalent software engineering experience.
Advanced SQL knowledge and experience working with relational databases, query authoring (SQL). Preferably on MS SQL
Advanced Knowledge in reporting service tools. Preferably Microsoft SSRS
Advanced Knowledge in ETL / data pipeline applications. Preferably Microsoft SSIS.
Experienced in performing root cause analysis on internal and external data and processes to answer specific business questions and identify opportunities for improvement.
Have an understanding and experience regarding the reporting dashboard and data warehouse concepts
Experienced in object-oriented/object function scripting languages: Python, Java, C#,C++, 
Proficiency in source control i.e. Git.
Got 2+ years of experience in Data Engineering role.
Familiar with Azure ETL product like Azure Data Factory, Azure Synapse, Azure Datalake, Azure Devops would be a great addition.

Are you looking for new challenges and personal growth within Coca-Cola Europacific Partners Indonesia? Then we have a great opportunity for you.
Please attach an updated CV with your application.

The Lead Data Scientist will deliver AI explorations identified via the AI Incubator process across the APS region. This hands-on role requires a data scientist with a commercial or supply chain background and demonstrated experience in using time-series, supervised, and unsupervised machine learning techniques. The candidate's experience in the retail or food and beverage industry will be highly regarded.

Key Responsibilities 
Develop and implement data science solutions leveraging Databricks.
Collaborate with business stakeholders to align AI initiatives with business objectives.
Provide insights and recommendations based on statistical analysis and machine learning.
Stay abreast of advancements in AI and data science and use cases.
Be a trusted advisor to the local business regarding Data Science and AI, its applications, use cases, and limitation

Experience (On the Job)    
Strong understanding of AI explainability and familiarity with techniques such as SHAP values and counterfactual explanations to ensure models are highly explainable and provide expected results.
Strong communication skills for conveying technical insights to stakeholders.
Demonstrated experience in driving value through analytics.
Experience working in large and complex environments.
Familiarity with emerging capabilities within AI such as LLMs, RAGs, and AI agents, and the ability to articulate their use cases and risks.
Experience with the design of artifacts within MLflow to monitor models in production.

Candidate Qualifications / Licences    
PhD or Master’s degree in Machine Learning, Data Science, or a related field.
Proficiency in Spark, Python, SQL, and cloud platforms (e.g., Databricks, Azure).
9+ years of experience in a technical data science role

Behavioural Competencies
Analytical thinking and problem-solving skills.
Strong collaboration and teamwork abilities.
Effective communication and presentation skills.
Adaptability and continuous learning mindset.

Job Accountability:
Define and prioritize the DMS product backlog based on data-driven insights, business value, and user needs.
Translate data models, analytics features (e.g., smart search, automated tagging, predictive analytics), and user behavior insights into clear user stories and technical requirements.
Collaborate with data engineers and developers to build, deploy, and monitor machine learning models integrated into the DMS (e.g., OCR enhancement, document classification, workflow automation)
Validate product increments, oversee A/B testing, and use metrics (e.g., user engagement, processing accuracy) to drive continuous product improvement.
Requirement:
Bachelor’s degree in Data Science, Computer Science, Statistics, or a related quantitative field.
Familiar with ML/AI (NLP, computer vision) and analytics tools (Python, SQL, TensorFlow/PyTorch).
Experience with cloud platforms (AWS/GCP/Azure) and data pipeline tools.
Previous experience or strong understanding of Agile/Scrum methodologies; acting as a Product Owner is a plus.
Excellent communication skills to bridge technical data concepts with business and user requirements.

Kualifikasi Utama:
Pendidikan minimal S1 (Statistika, Matematika, Teknik Industri, Sistem Informasi, Informatika, atau jurusan terkait)
Pengalaman minimal 1-2 tahun sebagai Data Analyst, diutamakan industri logistik, transportasi, atau fleet
Sangat mahir Excel / Google Sheets dan terbiasa mengolah data kompleks
Berpengalaman membuat dashboard & visualisasi data (Power BI / Tableau / Looker)
Memahami dan menganalisis KPI fleet (utilisasi, BBM, maintenance, downtime, productivity)
Mampu memberikan insight & rekomendasi strategis berbasis data
Terbiasa berkoordinasi dengan tim operasional dan manajemen
Memiliki kemampuan analisis dasar, teliti, dan detail-oriented
Adaptif dan mampu bekerja di lingkungan perusahaan yang dinamis
Memiliki kemauan belajar tinggi dan komunikasi yang baik

We’re Hiring: Psycometrics Analytics Specialist!
Di Peepl, kami percaya keputusan strategis organisasi harus didukung oleh data yang valid dan dapat diinterpretasikan secara tepat.
Kami mencari Psycometrics Analytics Specialist yang mampu memastikan kualitas dan pemanfaatan data psikometri untuk mendukung pengambilan keputusan organisasi berbasis data.
Kualifikasi:
• Pendidikan minimal S2 Psikometri.
• Memiliki pengalaman minimal 5 tahun dalam pengembangan, evaluasi, atau analisis alat   tes psikologi
• Memiliki kemampuan komunikasi yang baik untuk menjelaskan konsep psikometri kepada pemangku kepentingan non-teknis.
• Memiliki kemampuan komunikasi, koordinasi, dan teamwork yang baik.
• Memiliki Sertifikasi Psikometri/Statistik menjadi nilai tambah.
• Pengalaman bekerja di organisasi dengan standar tata kelola dan sistem manajemen mutu (misalnya ISO) menjadi nilai tambah).
Saatnya membawa kemampuan analisis dan insight datamu ke level berikutnya. Apply sekarang!

Job Descriptions: 
Analyze credit bureau data, financial transactions, and alternative data sources to extract actionable insights for credit risk and business strategy.
Develop statistical models, dashboards, and visualizations to support risk assessment and portfolio monitoring.
Assist in building and deploying traditional and machine learning models for credit scoring, alternative scoring, and collections analytics.
Collaborate with the Business Consulting team to deliver data-driven recommendations tailored to client objectives.
Contribute to pre-sales efforts by preparing insights, data summaries, and supporting technical discussions with clients.
Ensure data accuracy, integrity, and compliance with relevant credit bureau and regulatory standards.
Support the continuous enhancement of analytics products in alignment with market needs and organizational goals.

Tentang Kami
Rockbros Cycling Indonesia adalah official distributor produk Rockbros di Indonesia. Kami mengelola berbagai online store di marketplace seperti Shopee, Lazada, TikTok Shop, dan Tokopedia.
Kami sedang mencari Data Analyst yang kuat di data dan memahami dasar keuangan / accounting untuk membantu menganalisa performa online store kami secara menyeluruh.
Tanggung Jawab
Mengumpulkan, mengolah, dan menganalisa data performa online store dari seluruh marketplace.
Membuat laporan performa harian, mingguan, dan bulanan (sales, traffic, conversion rate, campaign).
Menganalisa efektivitas promo, voucher, flash sale, dan iklan berbayar.
Menganalisa performa produk (best seller, slow moving, margin, dan peluang pengembangan).
Melakukan analisa pengeluaran, margin, dan profitabilitas produk atau campaign.
Memberikan rekomendasi berbasis data untuk optimasi harga, stok, dan strategi pemasaran.
Membuat dashboard dan visualisasi data untuk kebutuhan internal dan manajemen.
Berkolaborasi dengan tim e-commerce, marketing, operasional, dan keuangan.
Kualifikasi
Pendidikan minimal D3/S1 di bidang Statistik, Matematika, Data Science, Sistem Informasi, Akuntansi, atau bidang terkait.
Pengalaman minimal 1–2 tahun sebagai Data Analyst, terutama di e-commerce atau marketplace.
Menguasai Microsoft Excel / Google Sheets (advanced).
Memahami metrik e-commerce seperti GMV, AOV, CVR, ROAS, ROI, dan sejenisnya.
Memahami dasar keuangan / accounting, termasuk:
Perhitungan margin & profit
Analisa pengeluaran dan laporan sederhana (P&L basic)
Menguasai SQL, Python, atau BI tools (Looker, Tableau, Power BI) menjadi nilai tambah.
Teliti, analitis, komunikatif, dan mampu bekerja mandiri maupun dalam tim.

Halo Robotics adalah perusahaan terkemuka di Indonesia yang menyediakan layanan drone komersial, robot darat (ground robots), dan embodied AI. Kami menyediakan layanan menyeluruh untuk solusi otomasi drone meliputi berbagai industri, termasuk instalasi software automasi On-Premise drone yang diterapkan pada server pelanggan dan jaringan lokal. Pada banyak kasus, kami juga memerlukan koneksi API pada software lain dan alat pemrosesan data yang digunakan oleh customer; data diperoleh secara otomatis oleh drone, diproses secara otomatis oleh software, dan diekspor ke dalam software yang digunakan oleh customer, seluruh proses dilakukan dalam lingkungan server dan jaringan on-premise yang terjaga keamanannya.
System Administrator (SysAdmin) bertanggung jawab atas penyiapan, pengelolaan, dan pemeliharaan infrastruktur server fisik maupun virtual yang mendukung berbagai sistem enterprise dan platform AI berbasis on-premise. Peran ini berfokus pada kesiapan infrastruktur, instalasi sistem operasi, pengelolaan lisensi tingkat server, keamanan sistem, serta memastikan seluruh sistem berjalan stabil dan siap digunakan di lingkungan produksi
Requirements:
Pendidikan minimal S1 di bidang Teknik Informatika, Sistem Informasi, Ilmu Komputer, atau bidang terkait
Berpengalaman sebagai  System Administrator atau Infrastructure Engineer, IT Operations Engineer
Pengalaman kuat dalam:
Linux Server (Ubuntu diutamakan)
Virtualisasi (VMware, Proxmox, Hyper-V)
Manajemen server fisik dan storage
Pengalaman mengelola infrastruktur on-premise dan lisensi tingkat server. 
Pemahaman dasar jaringan (TCP/IP, firewall, VLAN)
Mampu melakukan troubleshooting sistem secara mandiri
Pengalaman dengan sistem surveillance, command center, atau platform AI
Kemampuan scripting dasar (Bash atau PowerShell)
Pemahaman backup, disaster recovery, dan high availability
Berpengalaman dengan: Surveillance systems, Command center platforms, AI / data processing platforms
Bengalaman hybrid cloud environments.
Familiar dengan: Docker / container-based deployments, GPU servers untuk AI workloads (nilai tambah)
Mampu bekerja dan berkoordinasi dengan SysOps dan DevOps
Berpengalaman deployment untuk Government dan Industrial enterprise clients

Job Description:
On-Premise Server & Infrastructure Management
- Merancang dan mengelola on-premise server infrastructure untuk: DJI FlightHub 2 On-Premise dan Robotics & data processing systems (Unitree)
- Instalasi, konfigurasi, dan maintenance: Server fisik dan Storage systems (NAS / SAN / local storage)
- Mengelola lisensi software tingkat server dan enterprise systems.
Virtualization & Platform Management
- Mengelola environment virtualisasi: VMware, Proxmox dan Hyper-V
- Menyusun VM architecture untuk: Application servers, Data processing dan AI workloads
- Monitoring resource usage dan performance optimization
Linux Server Administration
- Memahami administrasi Linux Server (Ubuntu diutamakan): Installation & configuration, Patch management & updates, User & permission management
- Troubleshooting OS-level dan application-level issues.
Mendukung deployment software berbasis Linux untuk robotics dan drone platforms.
Networking & Connectivity
- Konfigurasi dan troubleshooting: TCP/IP, Firewall, VLAN, VPN
- Mendukung konektivitas:
On-premise ↔ cloud
Command center ↔ field systems (drones & robots)
- Bekerja sama dengan tim network klien untuk integrasi ke existing infrastructure
Automation & Scripting
- Mengembangkan scripting dasar menggunakan Bash dan PowerShell untuk: Automation, Maintenance dan Monitoring
Deployment & Technical Support
- Onsite deployment, commissioning, dan handover ke klien.
- Menyusun dokumentasi teknis berupa System architecture dan SOP operasional
- Menjadi escalation point untuk isu infrastruktur tingkat lanjut.

Ability to work independently as well as in a team environment
Good communication skills

Who We Are:
Live Play Mobile Inc. is an innovative leader in the mobile gaming industry, delivering immersive live gaming experiences that combine live entertainment with mobile play. Our flagship title, Live Play Bingo, features live hosts and real-time interaction, engaging players in a social and competitive environment. With decades of management experience in gaming and entertainment, we’re committed to pushing the boundaries of mobile games. As we grow, we seek talented individuals who are passionate about redefining the mobile gaming experience.
Job Summary:
We’re seeking a highly analytical and hands-on Data Analyst to drive insights across product and marketing initiatives for our live mobile game. In this role, you’ll play a key part in understanding player behavior, improving retention and monetization, and supporting data-driven decision-making across the company. Partnering closely with product, marketing, and developer teams, you’ll translate complex data into actionable insights while also owning the underlying data pipelines and analytics infrastructure that power the business.
Additionally this role is at the forefront of the AI revolution in analytics: it embraces GenAI/LLMs to accelerate output and deliver more complete, thorough analysis faster. You should be ahead of the curve using modern AI tools (e.g., Claude Code, OpenClaw, and the latest LLM models) to speed up exploratory analysis, experiment readouts, dashboard iteration, ETL development, documentation, and stakeholder communication—while maintaining high standards for accuracy, reproducibility, and data governance.
Responsibilities:
Work closely with product and marketing teams to deliver actionable insights that improve retention, engagement, and monetization.
Answer product and marketing questions through exploratory analysis and ad-hoc reporting.
Design and analyze A/B tests for game features, events, and monetization experiments.
Build and maintain dashboards for product, marketing, and leadership teams.
Own the end-to-end data pipeline, from raw event ingestion to analysis-ready tables.
Develop and maintain ETL workflows using both internal and third-party sources.
Manage data storage and transformations across S3 and Snowflake.
Orchestrate data workflows using Apache Airflow.
Ensure data quality, consistency, and reliability across the analytics stack.
Leverage GenAI/LLMs to accelerate analysis and development (SQL, Python, ETL, dashboards, documentation), and to create repeatable “analysis playbooks” and faster experiment reporting for stakeholders.
Evaluate and adopt new AI tools and workflows that improve team speed and decision quality, with appropriate validation, testing, and guardrails.
Required Experience
5+ years of experience in data analytics in mobile apps or gaming.
Strong SQL skills with experience querying large, complex datasets.
Experience analyzing user behavior, retention, monetization, and marketing performance.
Familiarity with A/B testing and experimental analysis.
Hands-on experience with modern data tools such as Snowflake, S3, or Airflow.
Experience building and maintaining ETL pipelines.
Experience with BI tools, preferably Looker.
Strong problem-solving skills and a business-oriented mindset.
Comfortable working cross-functionally with product, marketing, and engineering teams.
Self-motivated and able to take ownership of data projects end-to-end.
Strong presentation skills; ability to communicate complex results throughout an organization.
A love or strong desire to work with mobile games.
Demonstrated ability to use GenAI/LLM tools to accelerate analytics and engineering work (e.g., Claude Code, OpenClaw, or similar), with a clear approach to validating AI outputs and ensuring correctness.
Curiosity and initiative to stay current with new LLM models and GenAI tooling, and to apply them responsibly to improve speed, depth, and quality of insights.
Working Hours:
Full Time, flexible schedule
Must have reliable availability during California and European business hours
Compensation:
Competitive salary (paid in local currency)
Comprehensive Health insurance
Paid time off
Employment will be under local company and laws
Opportunity for expanded responsibilities and career development.
How To Apply:
Please send your CV, a brief note of interest, and a 1-minute video introducing yourself and describing why you’d be a great fit for this role.
EMAIL YOUR APPLICATION AND 1-MIN VIDEO INTRO TO: 
da-application@liveplaymobile.com

Responsibilities:
Support BAU, Planning, and Forecasting activity for Inforce metrices (Expected Return, Persistency-Expense-Claims-Other Variance, and OFSG). Including but not limited to assisting the deliverables of Group & internal management reports and metrics consolidations, assisting in responding to requests/queries, and assisting in investigation processes.
Focus on performing claim variance analysis and interpret results of analysis
Develop enhancement for work processes
Work with actuarial colleagues to develop actuarial understanding and demonstrate increasing knowledge of actuarial scope to build value adding
Requirements:
Currently pursuing or have completed Bachelor's degree in Actuarial Science or related field (Mathematics/Statistics)
Familiar to operate statistical & financial tools (Excel & SQL)
Preferred to have advance skill in Excel

What you will do

1. Credit Scoring &Modeling
Support HQ indevelopingandmaintainingcreditscoringmodelsusingSQL,Python,and machine learning techniques. Contribute to credit policy refinement through data-driven insights and model performance analysis.

2. Portfolio Monitoring & Reporting
Monitor portfolio performance, delinquency, and loss trends to identify early risk signals.
Deliver monthly portfolio reports and analytical insights for management and related business units.

3. Exploration of New Data Sources & Tools
Evaluate and test alternate local data sources or tools to enhance underwriting precision.
Lead proof-of-concept (POC) initiatives and assess their business and risk impact.

4. Regulatory & Partner Engagement
Represent the Credit Risk team in OJK audits and bank partner engagements.
Prepare reports and defend the company’s portfolio quality and underwriting standards to regulators and partners.

What you will need to have
1. Bachelor's or Master's in Finance, Statistics, Mathematics, Data Science, or related field.
2. 4-6 years experience in data science, credit scoring model development, portfolio analytics, or credit management. Ideally in fintech or retail banking. Exposure to OJK/regulatory audits is preferred.
3. Strong in SQL & Python skills, statistical modelling and ML knowledge.
4. Experience with portfolio reporting and impact analysis. Familiarity with OJK credit risk requirements.
5. Possess analytical and detail oriented. Strong communicator, able to present insights clearly.
6. Collaborative, and able to manage multiple priorities.

Responsibilities

Support data-driven decision-making through advanced statistical analysis and modeling.
Perform feature engineering, model training, validation, and evaluation.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to translate business problems into scalable data science solutions.
Deploy and monitor machine learning models in production environments.
Ensure model performance, reliability, and continuous improvement.

Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Statistics, Mathematics, Data Science, Informatics Engineering, or a related field.
2–5 years of experience in data science or machine learning.
Strong proficiency in Python.
Hands-on experience with ML libraries such as Scikit-learn, TensorFlow, or PyTorch.
Solid understanding of SQL and data manipulation techniques.
Strong foundation in inferential statistics and probability.
Experience in feature engineering and model evaluation.
Experience building and deploying machine learning models to production.
Understanding of MLOps practices and model deployment (API, Docker, Cloud).

AI/ML-related certifications.

Experience working with Big Data platforms such as Snowflake, Azure, or BigQuery.
Experience in healthcare or finance domains.

PT IDX Solusi Teknologi Informasi (IDXSTI) was established in November 2018 as a subsidiary of the Indonesia Stock Exchange (IDX) and other Self-Regulatory Organizations (SROs), including KPEI/IDClear and KSEI. IDXSTI focuses on providing Information Technology (IT) services for the Indonesian capital market and other financial industries. Our objective is to deliver the best IT solutions to support the growth and development of Indonesia’s capital market.
At IDXSTI, we are dedicated to pushing the boundaries of innovation in our industry. We are looking for a results-driven and integrated team player to join our Team.
Key Responsibilities:
Identify business problems and provide actionable, data-driven recommendations.
Analyze financial, operational, and market data to support strategic decision-making.
Prepare detailed reports, executive summaries, and presentations on findings.
Conduct market research, competitor analysis, industry trend assessments or regulatory demands.
Lead or participate in Requirement Gathering, Business Process Mapping, and Gap Analysis activities.
Develop business cases, feasibility studies, and risk scenarios based on research.
Collaborate with product, strategy, and executive teams to translate insights into tangible actions.
Recommend changes to the company to improve efficiency and effectiveness.
Recommend third parties to collaborate on IT & product development.
Assist in integration planning between IDSTI product and external services
Requirement:
Bachelor degree (S1) in Management/Business and/or Information Technology/Computer Science.
Business Analyst/Risk Management/IT Strategic Planning/Leadership certification is a plus.
Have good English language skills.
Plus: knowledge of Brokerage Office Systems (BOFIS) or other capital market-related systems, Candidates with knowledge of BOFIS, trading workflows, or capital market back-office processes will have a significant advantage.
Have experience in the field of business development/analyst at least 3 year.
Detail oriented, well organized and neat in completing every task regardless of distractions.
Strong experience preparing business documentation (business cases, feasibility reports, etc.).
Strong skills in quantitative and qualitative analysis, critical thinking, and data-based decision making.

Job Description:
Develop and integrate platforms that enable development teams to access infrastructure, tools, and services through self-service capabilities.
Design, build, and maintain data engineering solutions to support business and application requirements.
Develop and maintain automation scripts for infrastructure provisioning, configuration, and management.
Configure, maintain, and optimize Kubernetes clusters to ensure application availability, performance, and reliability.
Support implementation and management of Change Data Capture (CDC) and Kafka-based streaming solutions.
Monitor platform performance and troubleshoot issues to maintain system stability and security.
Support implementation and maintenance of monitoring and logging tools such as Grafana and ELK Stack.
Support CI/CD pipeline implementation and containerization processes using Docker, Kubernetes, and Helm Chart.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to support application development and system integration.
Ensure platform and data infrastructure align with business needs, particularly within banking product processes.

Requirements:
Minimum Bachelor’s Degree (S1) from a reputable university in:
Computer Engineering
Informatics Engineering
Information Systems
Computer Science
Information Technology
Computer Systems
Management Information Systems
Minimum 3 years of experience as a Data Engineer.
Minimum 3 years of experience in projects or system development involving:
Change Data Capture (CDC)
Apache Kafka
Experience implementing or supporting projects involving:
Grafana
ELK Stack
CI/CD pipelines
Docker / Containerization
Kubernetes
Helm Chart
Strong understanding of Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC) including Waterfall and/or Agile methodologies.
Strong analytical skills with attention to detail.
Strong problem-finding and problem-solving capabilities.
Good understanding of banking product business processes.
Strong teamwork, communication, and interpersonal skills.

The role

Are you a skilled Business Intelligence professional with experience in the multifinance industry? Sigmatech, a leading technology company, is seeking an exceptional Business Intelligence (Multifinance Industry) specialist to join their team. This full-time role is based in South Jakarta, Jakarta, offering the opportunity to work for a dynamic and innovative organisation.
Job Requirements Business Intelligence Engineer
Hard Skills
1. Business Intelligence Tools
• Berpengalaman menggunakan Looker (LookML, dashboarding, eksplorasi data)
• Menguasai Tableau (dashboard interaktif, data blending, calculated fields)
• Familiar dengan integrasi data antar BI tools
2. Programming & Data Processing
• Menguasai Python untuk analisis data, automasi, ETL sederhana, dan integrasi API
• Pemahaman dasar SQL (query, join, aggregation, CTE)
• Pengalaman dengan data wrangling (pandas, numpy) dan data visualization libraries
(matplotlib, seaborn, plotly)
3. Data Management
• Memahami konsep data warehouse (, BigQuery, PostgreSQL,SQLServer)
• Mengerti ETL/ELT pipeline (Airflow, Talent,sejenisnya)
• Pengetahuan dasar tentang data governance, data quality, dan metadata management
4. Analytical & Business Acumen
• Mampu menerjemahkan kebutuhan bisnis menjadi dashboard atau laporan
• Memahami KPI dan metrik bisnis (finance, sales, marketing, operations)
• Pengalaman membuat self-service BI environment
Soft Skills
• Kemampuan komunikasi yang baik untuk menjembatani tim bisnis dan tim teknis
• Problem solving dan critical thinking
• Mampu bekerja dalam tim lintas fungsi (Product, Data, Engineering, Business)
• Rapi dalam dokumentasi dan menyusun definisi data
(Minimum 1-3 years of experience in business intelligence, data analytics or a related field, preferably in the multifinance industry)

Key Responsibilities:
• Mendesain, membangun, dan memelihara dashboard di Looker dan Tableau
• Mengembangkan model data di Looker (LookML) dan membuat dataset yang reusable
• Menulis Python scripts untuk automasi laporan, ETL, atau integrasi API eksternal
• Bekerja sama dengan tim data engineer untuk mengoptimalkan pipeline data
• Menyediakan insight berbasis data untuk mendukung keputusan bisnis
• Membuat dokumentasi BI (data dictionary, definisi KPI, flow data)
• Melatih user bisnis dalam menggunakan dashboard secara self-service

About us

Sigmatech is a leading provider of innovative technology solutions for the multifinance industry. Our mission is to empower our clients with data-driven insights that drive business success. With a team of passionate professionals and a commitment to excellence, we are dedicated to delivering cutting-edge BI solutions that transform the way our clients operate.
If you're ready to take your career in business intelligence to the next level, we encourage you to apply now.

Key Responsibilities
Build, maintain, and optimize data pipelines (batch & basic streaming).
Ensure data quality, reliability, and performance.
Support data models and datasets for analytics and reporting.
Collaborate with analytics, product, and engineering teams.
Monitor and troubleshoot data pipeline issues.
Document data workflows and technical processes.
Job Qualifications
1–2 years of experience as a Data Engineer or related role.
Strong SQL skills and experience with relational databases.
Proficient in Python (or similar scripting language).
Experience with data warehouses (e.g., BigQuery, Redshift, Snowflake).

Strong communication and collaboration skills.

Key Responsibilities

Data Quality & Integrity: Implement methods to clean, aggregate, and improve data reliability.

role: AI / Machine Learning Engineer – Quick Commerce App
description:
AI / Machine Learning Engineer – Quick Commerce App
Hiring Company: Confidential (Quick-Commerce / Fashion Tech Platform)
Recruitment Partner: Norvex Solutions
Location: Indonesia (Jakarta / Hybrid – as applicable)
Experience: 3–6 years (flexible based on capability)
Employment Type: Full-time
Apply at: Norvex@norvexsolutions.com
Role Overview
Our client, a fast-growing quick-commerce fashion tech company, is building AI-powered features for its mobile application to deliver personalized, real-time shopping experiences.
They are seeking an AI / Machine Learning Engineer to design, build, and scale intelligent features such as virtual wardrobe, outfit recommendations, personalization engines, and computer vision–based fashion recognition. This role is critical to delivering speed, accuracy, and personalization, which are core to quick commerce.
The role involves close collaboration with product, mobile, backend, and design teams in a high-ownership, product-driven environment.
Key Responsibilities
AI & Machine Learning Development
Design and implement computer vision models for clothing detection, classification, and attribute extraction (color, fabric, style, season)
Build recommendation systems using user behavior, purchase history, weather, occasion, and trend data
Develop personalization algorithms tailored to individual user preferences and style
Train, evaluate, and optimize models for low latency and high accuracy, especially for mobile use cases
Virtual Wardrobe & Styling Features
Enable users to upload images or sync purchases to create a digital wardrobe
Implement AI-driven tagging and wardrobe organization
Recommend outfits using:
Existing wardrobe items
Available quick-commerce inventory
Support mix-and-match, styling suggestions, and “buy-to-complete-the-look” experiences
Integration & Performance
Integrate AI models with iOS/Android apps and backend systems
Optimize models for real-time inference and edge/cloud deployment
Work with backend teams to connect AI recommendations to live catalogs and inventory
Ensure solutions scale to support high concurrent traffic
Data, Experimentation & Optimization
Work with large-scale image and behavioral datasets
Run A/B testing to continuously improve recommendation quality
Monitor model performance, bias, and drift in production
Required Skills & Qualifications
Technical Skills
Strong proficiency in Python
Hands-on experience with ML frameworks such as TensorFlow, PyTorch, ONNX
Solid experience in Computer Vision (CNNs, object detection, embeddings)
Proven experience building recommendation systems (collaborative, content-based, hybrid)
Familiarity with mobile ML deployment (TensorFlow Lite, Core ML)
Experience with REST APIs, cloud platforms (AWS / GCP / Azure), and MLOps pipelines
Understanding of databases and data pipelines
Domain & Industry Exposure
Understanding of fashion/apparel attributes and styling concepts (preferred)
Experience with e-commerce or quick-commerce platforms is a strong advantage
Nice-to-Have
Exposure to Generative AI for outfit visualization or styling
Knowledge of LLMs for conversational fashion assistants
Experience with high-scale consumer apps or real-time systems
Familiarity with AR / virtual try-on technologies
What the Client Offers
Opportunity to build cutting-edge AI features for a fast-scaling quick-commerce platform
End-to-end ownership of AI solutions impacting real users
Competitive compensation and long-term growth opportunity
Collaborative, fast-paced, product-first environment

Kualifikasi Utama:
Pendidikan minimal S1 (Statistika, Matematika, Teknik Industri, Sistem Informasi, Informatika, atau jurusan terkait)
Pengalaman minimal 1-2 tahun sebagai Data Analyst, diutamakan industri logistik, transportasi, atau fleet
Sangat mahir Excel / Google Sheets dan terbiasa mengolah data kompleks
Berpengalaman membuat dashboard & visualisasi data (Power BI / Tableau / Looker)
Memahami dan menganalisis KPI fleet (utilisasi, BBM, maintenance, downtime, productivity)
Mampu memberikan insight & rekomendasi strategis berbasis data
Terbiasa berkoordinasi dengan tim operasional dan manajemen
Memiliki kemampuan analisis dasar, teliti, dan detail-oriented
Adaptif dan mampu bekerja di lingkungan perusahaan yang dinamis
Memiliki kemauan belajar tinggi dan komunikasi yang baik

About the Role
We are seeking a Financial Analyst who combines financial modeling capability with hands-on experience in the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js) and TypeScript.
This role focuses on translating financial logic and statistical reasoning into scalable web-based simulation systems and decision-support tools.
Candidates with 2–3 years of relevant experience are preferred. Strong fresh graduates with solid technical foundations are also welcome to apply.
Key Responsibilities
Build and structure financial models (forecasting, cash flow, scenario analysis).
Implement financial logic in MERN + TypeScript applications.
Develop and enhance React-based dashboards and simulation interfaces.
Build backend services using Node.js and Express.
Manage financial data using MongoDB.
Integrate APIs and handle structured data flows (REST, JSON).
Test and validate model accuracy within web systems.
Collaborate with consultants and product teams on system improvements.

Requirements
Degree in IT / Computer Science, Finance, Business, or a related field.
2–3 years of relevant experience in financial analysis, modeling, or related roles (fresh graduates with strong technical skills may also apply).
Demonstrated experience building financial models (academic, internship, or professional).
Proficiency in TypeScript.
Practical understanding of the MERN stack
Understanding of frontend–backend data flow.
Familiarity with REST APIs and JSON.
Experience with Git.
Strong analytical reasoning and structured problem-solving skills.

What You’ll Gain
Exposure to real-world simulation systems used in corporate decision-making.
Hands-on experience building scalable financial engines in a modern web stack.
Cross-functional collaboration across finance, product, and engineering.
Growth toward Simulation Developer, Financial Systems Engineer, or Product Modeling roles.
About Int Labs
Int Labs is an innovative training and consultancy company built by practitioners, entrepreneurs, and founders. Originating in Singapore, we specialize in providing experiential, simulation-based training solutions, focusing on leadership development, innovation capabilities, and strategic planning for ambitious corporations in Indonesia and across the region.

Qualifications
We are looking for a highly motivated, detail-oriented individual with a strong interest in genomic and molecular laboratory work.
Requirements:
Bachelor’s degree (S1) in Biology, Biotechnology, Biomedicine, or related fields
Open for fresh graduates or candidates with relevant laboratory experience
Strong understanding of Good Microbiology Practice and molecular laboratory techniques
Good and accurate pipetting skills
Experience operating laboratory instruments such as extraction systems, PCR instruments, Electrophoresis equipment
Experience with sequencer or microarray platforms will be an advantage
Detail-oriented, disciplined, and able to work according to SOPs
Able to work both independently and collaboratively within a team
Strong commitment to quality, laboratory safety, and data integrity
Job Description
As a Laboratory Analyst, you will play a critical role in genomic and molecular testing processes, ensuring accurate, reliable, and high-quality laboratory results in accordance with established standards.
Key Responsibilities:
Prepare, verify, process, and properly store genomic samples in the laboratory
Operate, calibrate, and maintain laboratory instruments in accordance with SOPs
Perform method, reagent, and instrument validation to ensure accuracy and quality of test results
Manage storage of reagents, specimens, and consumables under appropriate conditions and temperatures
Implement and comply with laboratory quality management systems in accordance with ISO 9001, ISO 35001, and ISO 15189 standards
Support continuous quality improvement and laboratory safety practices
Collaborate with internal teams to ensure smooth testing workflow and timely reporting

Tugas & Tanggung Jawab (Job Desk):
Analisis Performa Penjualan: Mengevaluasi pencapaian target penjualan mingguan dan bulanan, serta mengidentifikasi faktor pendorong (driver) atau penghambat penjualan.
Optimasi Inventory: Menganalisis siklus hidup produk (product lifecycle) dan memberikan rekomendasi strategi markdown (diskon) atau restock untuk menjaga kesehatan stok di gudang dan toko.
Riset Pasar & Tren: Melakukan analisis kompetitor dan tren fashion untuk membantu tim Merchandising menentukan arah koleksi berikutnya.
Evaluasi Promosi: Menghitung ROI (Return on Investment) dari setiap kampanye marketing dan promosi toko guna memastikan efektivitas anggaran.
Peningkatan Proses Bisnis: Mengidentifikasi inefisiensi dalam operasional retail (seperti alur distribusi atau sistem kasir) dan mengusulkan solusi perbaikan.
Pelaporan Strategis: Menyusun presentasi laporan yang mendalam namun mudah dipahami oleh jajaran manajemen sebagai landasan pengambilan keputusan.
Kualifikasi & Persyaratan:
Pendidikan: Minimal S1 di bidang Bisnis, Manajemen, Ekonomi, Statistika, atau Teknik Industri.
Pengalaman: Minimal 2-3 tahun pengalaman sebagai Business Analyst atau posisi serupa (diutamakan dari industri Retail atau E-commerce).
Kemampuan Analitis: Memiliki kemampuan berpikir kritis yang kuat, mampu menghubungkan titik-titik data yang berbeda menjadi satu kesimpulan logis.
Kemampuan Teknis:
Mahir dalam menggunakan Microsoft Excel (Advanced: Pivot Table, VLOOKUP/XLOOKUP, Macro/VBA).
Familiar dengan alat visualisasi data seperti Tableau, Power BI, atau BI BES.
Memahami dasar-dasar SQL untuk penarikan data merupakan nilai tambah.
Keahlian Bisnis: Memahami konsep KPI retail seperti Same-Store Sales Growth (SSSG), Sell-through Rate, dan Gross Margin Return on Investment (GMROI).
Komunikasi: Mampu berkomunikasi dengan baik dan mempresentasikan ide secara persuasif kepada berbagai tingkat pemangku kepentingan.
Karakter: Jujur, teliti, proaktif, dan mampu bekerja di bawah tekanan dalam lingkungan retail yang dinamis.
